name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linkify Code Review URLs for Google Readerâ„¢

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you follow Chromium Code Reviews inside Google Reader, you do want the ability to click on a link.

Changelog:

2.2:
- Added Gerrit URLs

2.1: 
- Added manifest_version 2
- Removed Mutation Summary JavaScript library and replaced it by WebKitMutationObserver   
- Runs also on non secure version of Google Reader
